From 0f18285565dc0bef0d9ad711879bd5873f9733af Mon Sep 17 00:00:00 2001
From: 0ceanSlim <chriskerr@gmx.com>
Date: Wed, 8 Nov 2023 16:49:44 -0500
Subject: [PATCH] list balance fixed

---
 .gitignore     | 2 +-
 listBalance.py | 7 ++++++-
 2 files changed, 7 insertions(+), 2 deletions(-)

diff --git a/.gitignore b/.gitignore
index 4bdc9d5..8f48e49 100644
--- a/.gitignore
+++ b/.gitignore
@@ -1 +1 @@
-/my_rpc_config.json
\ No newline at end of file
+/rpc_config.json
\ No newline at end of file
diff --git a/listBalance.py b/listBalance.py
index 9b4897c..0bc5da4 100644
--- a/listBalance.py
+++ b/listBalance.py
@@ -40,8 +40,13 @@ try:
                 print("Invalid wallet selection. Exiting.")
                 exit()
 
+        # Connect to the selected wallet by specifying the wallet file name
+        rpc_wallet_connection = AuthServiceProxy(
+            f"http://{rpc_user}:{rpc_password}@{rpc_host}:{rpc_port}/wallet/{wallet_name}"
+        )
+
         # List unspent transaction outputs (UTXOs)
-        utxos = rpc_connection.listunspent(0, 9999999, [], True)
+        utxos = rpc_wallet_connection.listunspent(0, 9999999, [], True)
 
         # Calculate asset balances
         asset_balances = {}
--
libgit2 1.6.4
